io.orchestrate.client

Class HttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.orchestrate.client.HttpClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Client

    public final class HttpClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements Client
    A client used to read and write data to the Orchestrate.io service.

    Usage: 

     Client client = new ClientBuilder("your api key").build();

 // OR (as a shorthand with default settings):
 Client client = new HttpClient("your api key");

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.orchestrate.client.Client

        Client.API

    • Constructor Detail

      • HttpClient

        public HttpClient(java.lang.String apiKey)
        Create a new client with the specified apiKey and default JacksonMapper.

        Equivalent to: 

         Client client = new ClientBuilder("your api key").build();
        Parameters:
        apiKey - An API key for the Orchestrate.io service.

      • HttpClient

        public HttpClient(java.lang.String apiKey,
          com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper)
        Create a new client with the specified apiKey and objectMapper.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - An API key for the Orchestrate.io service.
        objectMapper - The Jackson JSON mapper to marshall data with.

      • HttpClient

        public HttpClient(java.lang.String apiKey,
          JacksonMapper mapper)
        Create a new client with the specified apiKey and mapper.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - An API key for the Orchestrate.io service.
        mapper - The mapper to marshall data with.
